name: RPGFriend
description:
RPGFriend is a story-driven RPG following a fantasy adventure of the best band on the planet, Korean girl group Gfriend! The game is released in chapters, with the first release of the Prologue on July 31st 6pm KST. If you like Gfriend and you like RPGs, this is the game for you.

Tip: When playing on mobile, to access the pause menu click with two fingertips (hehe) and do the same to unpause the game.
